alert.note: Alert for Benton; Henry (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 11:09AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Benton and northern Henry Counties through NOON CDT... At 1109 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Paris, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Paris, Paris Landing State Park, Cottage Grove, Springville, Puryear, Big Sandy, Haigler Ridge, Foundry Hill, Old Springville, Crossland, Buchanan, India, Mill Creek, Osage, Sunnyside, Whitlock, Porter Court, Conyersville, Pine Hill and Big Sandy Unit Tennessee National Wildlife Refuge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
